item.description:
Hi Everyone!

This is one of my favorite restaurants north of Portland!   Come join us for some great food on a sunny cool July night.  Here is the link to their varied and super yummy menu!

http://damariscottarivergrill.com/

In addition to all those items on the menu, they always have a great selection of chalkboard specials which are equally as delectable.

Easy to find; just head north on Route 1 taking the Business Route 1 exit; it's about a mile from that point.  Easy to find on Google and plenty of parking in the municipal parking lot or street, especially at that time of day.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Dine in the Midcoast!
